One possible recipe is a roasted broccoli and tomato salad. To make this dish, preheat the oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit. Toss the broccoli florets, tomatoes, and penne in olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Spread the mixture on a baking sheet and roast for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve the roasted vegetables over a bed of lettuce and top with grated cheese.
